text: World Soul may refer to: * Anima mundi, the "world-soul" in Plato and derived traditions in Western philosophy ** Weltseele "world-soul" in German philosophy, see Weltgeist ("world-spirit") ** Atman (disambiguation), a Sanskrit term sometimes equated with anima mundi * Dusha Mira (1964), Russian science fiction novel, see World Soul (novel)
title: World Soul
